English: While using Dark Illusion, allows for a sudden attack from the shadows.
Filipino: Habang gumagamit ng Dark Illusion nagbibigay ng biglaang atake mula sa anino.

English: The second job class for Acrobats, they specialize in long distance attacks, mainly with a bow.
Filipino: Second job class para sa Acrobats; dalubhasa sa long distance attacks gamit ang bow.

English: This skill increases Critical Hit for a limited time.
Filipino: Pinapataas ang Critical Hit sa loob ng limitadong panahon.

English: This skill causes an explosion of frost, slowing all enemies in a certain area for a certain period of time.
Filipino: Nagdudulot ng frost explosion na nagpapabagal sa lahat ng kalaban sa isang area sa loob ng tiyak na panahon.

English: This skill gives the fire element to arrows and damages surrounding enemies.
Filipino: Binibigyan ng fire element ang mga palaso at sumasaktan ang mga kalaban sa paligid.

English: This skill pierces monsters who are a straight line, dealing damage to all of them.
Filipino: Tumutusok sa mga monsters sa isang tuwid na linya at sumasaktan sa lahat nila.

English: The strong damage and continuous poisonous damage will be occurred simutaneously.
Filipino: Nagdudulot ng malakas at tuloy tuloy na poisonous damage.

English: Deals strong damage and silences the target. While silenced, the target cannot cast spells of any kind.
Filipino: Malakas na atake na nag-silence sa target; habang naka-silence hindi makakagamit ng spells ang target.

English: This skill heightens the users senses with nature to increase Magic Defense & Bow Range.
Filipino: Pinapahusay ang senses ng user gamit ang kalikasan para pataasin ang Magic Defense at Bow Range.

English: Triple arrows will be shot to deal strong damage.
Filipino: Tatlong palaso ang sabay na itatapon para magdulot ng malakas na damage.

English: The first job class for Assists, uses a staff like an Assist. Focuses more on supporting party than damaging monsters.
Filipino: Unang job class para sa Assists; gumagamit ng staff at mas nakatuon sa pagsuporta sa party kaysa sa pagdudulot ng damage.

English: This buff increases the physical defense of the target.
Filipino: Buff na nagpapataas ng physical defense ng target.

English: This buff protects the target from incoming critical hits for a limited amount of time.
Filipino: Buff na pumoprotekta laban sa incoming critical hits sa limitadong panahon.

English: The enemy will take double damage.
Filipino: Magkakaroon ng double damage ang kalaban.

English: Greatly increases your physical attack power for a period of time.
Filipino: Malaki ang pagtaas ng physical attack power sa loob ng takdang panahon.

English: Increases accuracy, attack speed and attack power for all party members within range.
Filipino: Pinapataas ang accuracy; attack speed at attack power ng lahat ng party members sa loob ng range.

English: Recovers a large amount of HP for all party members.
Filipino: Nagre-recover ng malaking HP para sa lahat ng party members.

English: Deals damage over time to all enemies in a certain area.
Filipino: Nagdudulot ng damage over time sa lahat ng kalaban sa loob ng isang area.

English: The second job class for Assists, they use a knuckle hammer like Assists. They specialize in Critical attacks but have a slower attack speed.
Filipino: Second job class para sa Assists; gumagamit ng knuckle hammer at dalubhasa sa Critical attacks pero mabagal ang attack speed.

English: A skill that delivers one powerful dashing punch.
Filipino: Isang skill na nagbibigay ng isang malakas na dashing punch.

English: Strikes the enemy, making it bleed. Bleeding causes additional damage over time.
Filipino: Tinatamaan ang kalaban at pinapadala itong magdugo; ang pagdurugo ay nagdudulot ng karagdagang damage over time.

English: Dashes forward with a burning fist, striking the enemy.
Filipino: Sumusugod pasulong na may naglalagablab na kamao at tinatamaan ang kalaban.

English: Increases the attack power bonus of knuckles.
Filipino: Pinapataas ang attack power bonus ng knuckles.

English: When the skill works, it reduces the monsters defense and increases the monsters attack power.
Filipino: Kapag gumana ang skill pinapababa ang depensa ng monsters at pinapataas ang attack power nila.

English: An energy wave deals damage to all monsters around the caster.
Filipino: Isang energy wave na nagdudulot ng damage sa lahat ng monsters sa paligid ng caster.

English: Uses a knuckle hammer to strike with deadly speed.
Filipino: Gumagamit ng knuckle hammer para tumama nang napakabilis.

English: Strikes the enemy with concentrated power, consumes all MP.
Filipino: Tinatamaan ang kalaban ng concentrated power at ginagamit lahat ng MP.

English: The first job class for Magicians, they use staves like Magicians. They specialize in magic effecting large numbers of enemies at once.
Filipino: Unang job class para sa Magicians; gumagamit ng staves. Dalubhasa sa magic na tumatamaan ng maraming kalaban sabay sabay.
Isang fireball na tumatama sa kalaban.

English: Sheets of flame burn the enemy for a period of time.
Filipino: Mga alon ng apoy na sinusunog ang kalaban sa loob ng ilang sandali.

English: Increases damage done by fire skills.
Filipino: Pinapataas ang damage ng fire skills.

English: A spear made of rock strikes the enemy.
Filipino: Isang sibat na gawa sa bato ang tumatama sa kalaban.

English: Make a huge earthquake which deals a large amount of damage.
Filipino: Nagdudulot ng malakas na lindol na malaki ang damage.

English: Increases damage done by earth skills.
Filipino: Pinapataas ang damage ng earth skills.

English: Strong Wind damage is dealt to a single target.
Filipino: Malakas na Wind damage sa iisang target.

English: A strong wind slows all enemies around the caster for a period of time.
Filipino: Malakas na hangin na nagpapabagal sa lahat ng kalaban sa paligid ng caster.

English: Increases damage done by wind skills.
Filipino: Pinapataas ang damage ng wind skills.

English: Strong Lightning damage is dealt to a single target.
Filipino: Malakas na Lightning damage sa iisang target.

English: Deals lightning damage to all enemies around the caster, also lowering their defense temporarily.
Filipino: Nagdudulot ng lightning damage sa lahat ng kalaban sa paligid at pansamantalang pinapababa ang depensa nila.

English: Increases damage done by lightning skills.
Filipino: Pinapataas ang damage ng lightning skills.

English: A shark made of ice strikes the enemy.
Filipino: Isang pating na gawa sa yelo ang tumatama sa kalaban.

English: A poison cloud engulfs the enemy, dealing poison and wind damage.
Filipino: Isang ulap ng poison ang sumasakop sa kalaban; nagdudulot ng poison at wind damage.

English: Increases damage done by water skills.
Filipino: Pinapataas ang damage ng water skills.

English: Meteors strike all the enemies in a certain area, dealing fire and earth damage.
Filipino: Mga meteor na tumatama sa lahat ng kalaban sa isang area; nagdudulot ng fire at earth damage.

English: Lightning and wind damage is dealt to all enemies in the area of effect.
Filipino: Nagbibigay ng lightning at wind damage sa lahat ng kalaban sa area of effect.

English: A sand storm strikes all the enemies in a certain area, dealing wind and earth damage.
Filipino: Isang sand storm ang tumatama sa lahat ng kalaban sa isang area; nagdudulot ng wind at earth damage.

English: A blizzard strikes all the enemies in a certain area, dealing earth and water damage as well as stunning them.
Filipino: Isang blizzard ang tumatama sa lahat ng kalaban sa isang area; nagdudulot ng earth at water damage at maaari ring ma-stun sila.

English: The second job class for Magicians, they use a wand like a Magician. They specialize in magic attacks that assault the mind of the enemy.
Filipino: Second job class para sa Magicians; gumagamit ng wand at dalubhasa sa magic na sumasalakay sa isip ng kalaban.

English: Deals damage to the mind of the enemy, by creating illusions of devils.
Filipino: Nagdudulot ng damage sa isip ng kalaban sa pamamagitan ng paglikha ng ilusyon ng mga demonyo.

English: Confuses the enemy, and binds them in place for a certain amount of time.
Filipino: Nililito ang kalaban at pinipigil ito sa lugar sa loob ng ilang sandali.

English: Builds up spiritual power, and releases it to do massive damage.
Filipino: Nag-iipon ng spiritual power at inilalabas ito para magdulot ng malakas na damage.

English: Collapse the spirit of the enemy, deals damage based on MP.
Filipino: Sumisira sa espiritu ng kalaban; damage batay sa MP.

English: Creates a psychic barrier in front of the caster that the monster cannot pass.
Filipino: Lumilikha ng psychic barrier sa harap ng caster na hindi malalampasan ng monster.

English: Gives a certain chance to reflect skill and magic attacks, at double damage.
Filipino: May tsansang i-reflect ang skill at magic attacks pabalik sa doble ang damage.

English: If it works then it deals huge damage to the monster. If not, the caster takes the damage instead.
Filipino: Kung gumana magdudulot ito ng napakalaking damage sa monster; kung hindi ang caster ang makakatanggap ng damage.

English: Dazzles the monster and deals a large amount of damage.
Filipino: Nagdudulot ng matinding disorient at malaking damage sa monster.

English: This explains the information of various abilities that can be increased by growth of character.
Filipino: Nagpapaliwanag ng impormasyon ng iba't ibang abilidang puwedeng tumaas habang lumalago ang karakter.

English: The given name of the avatar/character.
Filipino: Ang ibinigay na pangalan ng avatar o karakter.

English: This shows the job/class that the player has chosen for his character.
Filipino: Ipinapakita ang job o class na pinili ng player para sa kanyang karakter.

English: This increases according to the accumulated experience. You get new Stat Points and Skill Points for every level reached.
Filipino: Tumataas ayon sa naipong experience. Makakakuha ka ng bagong Stat Points at Skill Points sa bawat level.

English: Weapon attack rate increases except for wands and bows.
Filipino: Pinapataas ang weapon attack rate maliban sa wands at bows.

English: Affects HP, FP, Defense and HP/FP restoration rate.
Filipino: Nakakaapekto sa HP; FP; Defense at rate ng HP/FP restoration.

English: Affects accuracy, attack speed, dodge rate, block rate, critical chance and bow attack power.
Filipino: Nakakaapekto sa accuracy; attack speed; dodge rate; block rate; critical chance at bow attack power.

English: Affects maximum MP, MP restoration amount, magic power and magic defense.
Filipino: Nakakaapekto sa maximum MP; MP restoration amount; magic power at magic defense.

English: This is the vitality of the character and the character will die if it reaches 0. You can recover it with food and pill items.
Filipino: Ang vitality ng karakter; mamamatay ang karakter kapag umabot sa 0. Pwede itong i-recover gamit ang food at pill items.

English: This is for using magic, you can revive it by drinking refresher.
Filipino: Ginagamit para sa magic; nare-recover gamit ang refresher.

English: This is needed to use physical skills. It can be replenished by resting/sitting down but it can be immediately recovered by using vitality drink items.
Filipino: Kailangan para gumamit ng physical skills. Puwedeng ma-replenish sa resting o pag-upo; pwede ring mabawi agad gamit ang vitality drink items.

English: This is required to raise the level of a character. It can be earned by killing monsters or through quests.
Filipino: Kinakailangan para tumaas ang level ng karakter. Nakukuha sa pagpatay ng monsters o pagsasagawa ng quests.

English: Skills get stronger as you level and put more points into them.
Filipino: Lumalakas ang skills habang tumataas ang level at naglalagay ng mas maraming points.

English: This is the point you get when you level up. You can distribute the points to your STR,STA,DEX, and INT.
Filipino: Punto na nakukuha kapag nag-level up. Maaari mong ilagay ang puntos sa STR; STA; DEX at INT.

English: Some skills require you to become a Hero before being usable, and require special training to be leveled / trained.
Filipino: May ilang skills na kailangan maging Hero muna bago magamit; at kailangan ng espesyal na training para i-level o i-train ang mga ito.

English: This shows the Attack Capacity of a character. The character’s equipment and supportive skills cast on the character also influences this.
Filipino: Ipinapakita ang Attack Capacity ng karakter. Apektado ito ng equipment at supportive skills na naka-cast sa karakter.

English: This shows the Defense Capacity of a character. The character’s equipment and supportive skills cast on the character also influences this.
Filipino: Ipinapakita ang Defense Capacity ng karakter. Apektado rin ito ng equipment at supportive skills.

English: This means how much chance you have to make a critical hit.
Filipino: Nagpapakita ng tsansa mong makagawa ng critical hit.

English: This shows the Attack Rate of a character when attacking.
Filipino: Ipinapakita ang rate ng pag-atake ng karakter.

English: This indicates how much “Reduced/Weakened magical damage” a character can receive.
Filipino: Nagpapakita kung gaano kalakas ang kakayahan ng karakter na bawasan o pahinain ang magic damage.

English: There are 5 elemental properties or attributes that exist in FLYFF. Each of these properties has a strength and weakness. A player can achieve the highest possible damage when he uses a weapon which is imbued with the property that is the weakness of his enemy’s property.
Filipino: May 5 elemental properties o attributes sa FLYFF. Bawat isa ay may kalakasan at kahinaan. Makakamit ang pinakamataas na damage kapag gumamit ng weapon na may property na kahinaan ng property ng kalaban.

English: Fire A property that is weak against the Wind property but is weak against the Water property.
Filipino: Property na malakas laban sa Wind pero mahina sa Water.

English: Water. A property that is as strong against the Fire Property but is weak against the Electricity property.
Filipino: Property na malakas laban sa Fire pero mahina sa Electricity.

English: A property that is strong against the Water Property but weak against the Earth Property.
Filipino: Property na malakas laban sa Water pero mahina sa Earth.

English: earth A property that is strong against the Electricity Property but weak against the Wind Property.
Filipino: Property na malakas laban sa Electricity pero mahina sa Wind.

English: A property that is strong against the Earth Property but weak against the Fire property.
Filipino: Property na malakas laban sa Earth pero mahina sa Fire.

English: Upgrading means making the item more powerful. Each item can be normally upgraded over 10 levels, and weapons / armor chest pieces can be elementally upgraded over 10 levels. If the upgrade fails, there is no penalty between levels 1 and 3, but from levels 4-10 the item will be lost.
Filipino: Ang pag-upgrade ay ang pagpapalakas ng item. Karaniwang puwedeng i-upgrade ang item hanggang +10. Ang weapons at armor chest pieces puwedeng i-elemental upgrade hanggang +10. Kung pumalya ang upgrade walang penalty sa levels 1 hanggang 3; pero mula levels 4 hanggang 10 maaaring mawala ang item.

English: Your item can receive an attribute modifier (visible in the name of the item) through various means, granting it extra STR, STA, DEX and/or INT.
Filipino: Ang item ay puwedeng magkaroon ng attribute modifier na makikita sa pangalan ng item; nagbibigay ito ng dagdag na STR; STA; DEX at/o INT.

English: When you refine an item with the Fire property, you’ll need a Fire Property Card. When an item is imbued with the Fire Property the item becomes weak to Water but stronger against Wind.
Filipino: Kapag nirefine ang item sa Fire property kailangan ng Fire Property Card. Kapag may Fire Property ang item ito ay mahina laban sa Water pero mas malakas laban sa Wind.

English: When you refine an item with the Water property, you’ll need a Water Property Card. When an item is imbued with the Water Property the item becomes weak to Electricity but stronger against Fire.
Filipino: Kapag nirefine ang item sa Water property kailangan ng Water Property Card. Kapag may Water Property ang item ito ay mahina laban sa Electricity pero mas malakas laban sa Fire.

English: When you refine an item with the Electricity property, you’ll need an Electricity Property Card. When an item is imbued with the Electricity Property the item becomes weak to Earth but stronger against Water.
Filipino: Kapag nirefine ang item sa Electricity property kailangan ng Electricity Property Card. Kapag may Electricity Property ang item ito ay mahina laban sa Earth pero mas malakas laban sa Water.

English: When you refine an item with the Wind property, you’ll need a Wind Property Card. When an item is imbued with the Wind Property the item becomes weak to Fire but stronger against Earth.
Filipino: Kapag nirefine ang item sa Wind property kailangan ng Wind Property Card. Kapag may Wind Property ang item ito ay mahina laban sa Fire pero mas malakas laban sa Earth.

English: When you refine an item with the Earth property, you’ll need an Earth Property Card. When an item is imbued with the Earth Property the item becomes weak to Wind but stronger against Electricity.
Filipino: Kapag nirefine ang item sa Earth property kailangan ng Earth Property Card. Kapag may Earth Property ang item ito ay mahina laban sa Wind pero mas malakas laban sa Electricity.

English: Normal upgrade means a non-element upgrade. Power Dice are required to upgrade, there are 5 types of Power Dice, 4, 6, 8, 10 and 12.
Filipino: Normal upgrade ay non-element upgrade. Kailangan ng Power Dice para mag-upgrade. May 5 uri ng Power Dice; 4; 6; 8; 10 at 12.

English: You can make an Ultimate Weapon with a +10 upgraded unique weapon by using the Ultimate Weapon Upgrade. The maximum upgrade for an Ultimate weapon is up to +10 the same as any other item upgrade but it needs 'Shining Orikalkum'. The Ultimate upgrade is available only for weapons, and the item is destroyed in case of a failure. From +6 you are able to socket your weapon.
Filipino: Pwede kang gumawa ng Ultimate Weapon gamit ang +10 upgraded unique weapon at Ultimate Weapon Upgrade. Ang maximum upgrade ng Ultimate weapon ay hanggang +10; kailangan ng Shining Orikalkum. Ang Ultimate upgrade ay para lamang sa weapons at mawawala ang item kapag pumalya. Mula +6 puwede mong lagyan ng socket ang weapon.

English: Information about the buildings that provide services.
Filipino: Impormasyon tungkol sa mga gusali na nagbibigay ng serbisyo.

English: This is a structure that gathers spiritual life and resurrects players who died. It is located inside a city or a wide open clearing.
Filipino: Isang istruktura na kumokolekta ng espirituwal na enerhiya at nagbubuhay muli sa mga manlalarong namatay; matatagpuan ito sa loob ng lungsod o malawak na clearing.

English: This is a structure that functions like a Lodestar but it resurrects a player in a place near the hunting grounds.
Filipino: Katulad ng Lodestar ang tungkulin ng istrukturang ito pero nire-resurrect nito ang manlalaro malapit sa hunting grounds.

English: This place sells weapons for the 1st job class such as vagrant, mercenary, and acrobat. It also sells weapons for the 2nd job class such as knight, blade, ringmaster, billposter, jester, and ranger.
Filipino: Dito binebenta ang mga sandata para sa first job classes tulad ng Vagrant; Mercenary; at Acrobat; pati na rin ang mga sandata para sa second job classes tulad ng Knight; Blade; Ringmaster; Billposter; Jester; at Ranger.

English: This place sells armor for Mercenaries, Assists, and Acrobats.
Filipino: Dito binebenta ang mga armor para sa Mercenaries; Assists; at Acrobats.

English: This place sells weapons, armor, and magic items best suited for Magicians.
Filipino: Dito binebenta ang mga armas; armor; at magic items na angkop para sa Magicians.

English: This shop sells food items that help recover HP
Filipino: Ang shop na ito ang nagbebenta ng pagkain na tumutulong mag-recover ng HP.

English: This place sells Arrows, Posters, and those sorts of things.
Filipino: Dito mabibili ang mga palaso; posters; at mga katulad na gamit.

English: This place is for selling Perin, using your personal bank, and guild bank.
Filipino: Dito ginagawa ang pagbenta ng Perin; paggamit ng personal bank; at guild bank.

English: This shop sells Flight related items like Flight gears as well as guide’s player on how to fly.
Filipino: Nagbebenta ang shop na ito ng flight related items tulad ng flight gears at gumagabay sa player kung paano lumipad.

English: A duel is a battle between 2 players. This is different from PK. It is called PvP (Player Vs Player) which can only start when 2 players agree to a duel. A duel has no penalties associated with it.
Filipino: Ang duel ay labanan sa pagitan ng dalawang player; naiiba ito sa PK; tinatawag itong PvP na nagsisimula lamang kapag parehong pumayag ang dalawang player; walang kaugnay na penalty ang duel.

English: You will gain the fame if you keep winning duels. You will also gain  different titles as well.
Filipino: Makakakuha ka ng fame kapag patuloy kang nananalo sa duels; makakakuha ka rin ng iba't ibang titles.

English: This place is for applying and running guild sieges and 1 on 1 guild sieges. Only available on the 1st sub server.
Filipino: Lugar para mag-apply at magpatakbo ng guild sieges at 1 on 1 guild sieges; available lamang sa unang sub server.

English: Please visit the official homepage: $WEBSITE$ for more inquiries. Have a nice day.
Filipino: Para sa iba pang tanong bumisita sa opisyal na homepage: $WEBSITE$; magandang araw.

English: You can change your hair style and color. The price varies based on the color and style you choose.
Filipino: Pwede mong baguhin ang hairstyle at kulay; nag-iiba ang presyo depende sa kulay at estilo na pipiliin mo.

English: Items can be conveniently presented for sale to through this option. You can set the quantity and the price.
Filipino: Pwede mong ilagay ang items para ibenta ng madali gamit ang opsyon na ito; pwede mong itakda ang quantity at presyo.

English: Open the Start menu, select Personal Shop, and the Personal Shop window will appear.
Filipino: Buksan ang Start menu; piliin ang Personal Shop at lalabas ang Personal Shop window.

English: Drag the items you wish to sell from your inventory and drop them into the Personal Shop window.
Filipino: I-drag ang mga item na gustong ibenta mula sa inventory at ilagay sa Personal Shop window.

English: After dragging the item into the window, you can set the price for the item, and the quantity you wish to sell.
Filipino: Pagkatapos i-drag ang item papasok sa window pwede mong itakda ang presyo at dami na ibebenta.

English: Put a name in the Shop Name Window, and press OK. You can start selling items after that.
Filipino: Ilagay ang pangalan sa Shop Name Window at pindutin ang OK; maaari ka nang magbenta.

English: There are some basic requirements to creating a Guild. You will need a party of three players all at least level 40, then you have to complete a quest through the Public office NPC Helena in SM. Once finished you and your party members will become a guild.
Filipino: May mga pangunahing requirements para makagawa ng Guild; kailangan ng party na binubuo ng tatlong players na bawat isa ay level 40 pataas; kailangan ding tapusin ang isang quest kay NPC Helena sa Public Office sa SM; kapag natapos magkakaguild na kayo ng party members.

English: Guild Members area able to contribute items and Penya towards raising the guild level. To contribute items, simply press the Support Button inside of the Guild Storage. Raising the Guild Level will open up various options to the Guild to help it grow and distinguish itself.
Filipino: Makakatulong ang mga guild members sa pagtaas ng guild level sa pamamagitan ng pag-aambag ng items at Penya; para mag-ambag ng items pindutin lang ang Support Button sa Guild Storage; ang pagtaas ng guild level ay magbubukas ng iba't ibang opsyon para lumago at magpakilala ang guild.

English: Initially only a Guild Master has the authority to invite Guild members. But a Guild Master can give authority to any Guildie to recruit other members to his Guild.
Filipino: Sa simula tanging ang Guild Master lang ang may awtoridad mag-imbita; pwede ibigay ng Guild Master ang awtoridad na mag-recruit sa ibang miyembro.

English: The Guild Master can disband the Guild by pressing the DISMISS button on the Guild Menu. Once the Guild is dismissed, it takes 2 days before Members can create or join a new Guild.
Filipino: Pwedeng i-disband ng Guild Master ang guild sa pamamagitan ng pagpindot ng DISMISS button sa Guild Menu; kapag na-dismiss kailangang maghintay ng dalawang araw bago makagawa o makasali ng bagong guild ang mga miyembro.

English: The Guild Master can manage his Guild from the Guild Menu. He can set things such as promotions, demotions, nicknames, kicking from Guild, etc.
Filipino: Pwede i-manage ng Guild Master ang guild mula sa Guild Menu; pwede niyang isaayos ang promotions; demotions; nicknames; kicking out ng miyembro; at iba pa.

English: The Guild Master can manage Guild Ranks in the Guild Menu. He can set the authority of the title, degree, admission, access to items and monthly payment.
Filipino: Pwede i-manage ng Guild Master ang Guild Ranks sa Guild Menu; puwede niyang itakda ang awtoridad ng title; degree; admission; access sa mga items; at monthly payment.

English: Guild Masters can make an announcement by clicking the Notice button on the Information Tab in the Guild Menu. Either a new message can be made of the old one can simply be modified.
Filipino: Makakagawa ng announcement ang Guild Master sa pamamagitan ng Notice button sa Information Tab ng Guild Menu; puwede gumawa ng bagong mensahe o i-edit ang luma.

English: The Guild Logo is the symbol or emblem of the Guild. This can be chosen only once and only by the Guild Master. To use this function, select the Logo button in the Guild Menu.
Filipino: Ang Guild Logo ang simbolo o emblem ng guild; ito ay pipiliin lamang minsanan at tanging Guild Master lang ang pwedeng pumili; piliin ang Logo button sa Guild Menu para gamitin ang function na ito.

English: You can use the Guild Storage only on the 1st Channel of each Server. Anyone can deposit items and Penya into the Guild Storage but only authorized Guild Members can withdraw items and penya.
Filipino: Magagamit ang Guild Storage lamang sa unang Channel ng bawat Server; lahat pwedeng magdeposit ng items at Penya; ngunit tanging authorized Guild Members lang ang makaka-withdraw.

English: You may have noticed when you first logged into the game that you were greeted by the Info-Pang in the lower right corner of your screen. This section briefly explains the Info-Pang and how to use him.
Filipino: Maaaring napansin mo noong unang login na isang Info-Pang ang tumatak sa lower right ng screen; ipapaliwanag ng bahaging ito ang Info-Pang at kung paano siya gamitin.

English: The Info-Pang will guide you through all of the basics including controls, hotkeys, menus, and even some game functions. Once you have completed a section, you can always access it if you need to review it. Simply right click on the Info-Pang and select Check the List.
Filipino: Gagabayan ka ng Info-Pang sa mga basic gaya ng controls; hotkeys; menus; at ilang game functions; kapag natapos mo na ang isang seksyon pwede mo itong balikan; i-right click lang ang Info-Pang at piliin ang Check the List.

English: The Info-Pang will be activated by default when you log into the game. If you would like to turn the Info-Pang off, Right Click on the Info-Pang and select Hide. If later you would like to recall the Info-Pang you can do that by accessing the Start Menu, selecting Helper, and then selecting Info-Pang.
Filipino: Awtomatikong naka-activate ang Info-Pang kapag nag-login ka; kung gusto mong patayin ito i-right click ang Info-Pang at piliin ang Hide; kung gusto mo naman siyang ibalik buksan ang Start Menu; piliin ang Helper; tapos piliin ang Info-Pang.

English: This is a duel between 2 players.
Filipino: Ito ay duel sa pagitan ng dalawang player.

English: It means a fight between characters by mutual agreement. Affects PVP fame and PVP point.
Filipino: PvP ay labanan sa pagitan ng mga karakter sa pamamagitan ng mutual agreement; nakakaapekto ito sa PVP fame at PVP points.

English: If you right-click with ALT key on the player whom you want to have duel with, you can have a duel with the player in case of that the user accepts that.
Filipino: Kung i-right click mo ang player habang hawak ang ALT key; puwede kang humiling ng duel kung tatanggapin ng kabilang user.

English: In case of that you are the leader of your troupe and the clicked one is another leader of other troupe, you can have a group duel, if the other lead accept it.
Filipino: Kung ikaw ang leader ng iyong grupo at ang naka-click ay leader ng ibang grupo; puwede magkaroon ng group duel kapag tinanggap din ng kabilang leader.

English: The result of PVP and Fame
Filipino: The result of PVP and Fame

English: PVP fame and PVP point change according to PvP record.
Filipino: Nagbabago ang PVP fame at PVP points ayon sa PvP record.

English: Guild bank and Guild sieges are available only at the 1st sub server of each server set.
Filipino: Guild bank at Guild sieges ay available lamang sa unang sub server ng bawat server set.

English: There are many kinds of missions: Daily Rewards, Time-Limited Events, Account Shared Achievements, etc. Complete them and you will receive various rewards such as Items, Custom Title, Attack Power Bonus, Penya or Bonus fCoins!
Filipino: Maraming klase ng missions tulad ng Daily Rewards; Time-Limited Events; Account Shared Achievements; atbp; kumpletuhin ang mga ito at makakakuha ka ng iba't ibang rewards gaya ng Items; Custom Title; Attack Power Bonus; Penya; o Bonus fCoins.

English:
Complete daily, weekly and season missions to receive rewards!

Don't forget to claim your rewards before the end of the Battle Pass season.

Points earned through the Season missions are not included in the weekly limit.
Filipino: Kumpletuhin ang daily; weekly; at season missions para makatanggap ng rewards; huwag kalimutang i-claim ang rewards bago matapos ang Battle Pass season\n\n ang points mula sa Season missions ay hindi kabilang sa weekly limit.

English: Create equipment presets, allowing you to have your sets, weapons, and accessories readily available. With a simple shortcut, you can effortlessly equip them without any hassle.
Filipino: Gumawa ng equipment presets para agad magamit ang iyong sets; weapons; at accessories; sa isang shortcut maaari mo itong i-equip nang madali.

English:
In the Kalgas Assault, each respawn from death takes a certain amount of time and increases with the number of respawns (up to 1 minute).
Spending Kalgas Coin will make you respawn with no waiting time, and the item can be purchased in Cash Shop.
Kalgas Silver Coins can only be used once, while Kalgas Gold Coins can be used for unlimited revives.
*Kalgas Gold Coins require an increased amount each time they are used (up to 20).
Filipino: Sa Kalgas Assault ang bawat respawn mula sa pagkamatay ay may tinakdang waiting time na tumataas depende sa dami ng respawns; hanggang isang minuto ang maximum. \n ang paggastos ng Kalgas Coin ay magpapabalik sa iyo nang walang wait time; mabibili ang item sa Cash Shop. \n ang Kalgas Silver Coins ay one time use lamang; ang Kalgas Gold Coins ay puwedeng gamitin para sa unlimited revives; *ang paggamit ng Kalgas Gold Coins ay nangangailangan ng dagdag na halaga sa bawat paggamit hanggang sa 20.

English: This window manages your couple. Through this window, you can check information about your couple and utilize functions available with your couple. All functions can be used by any member of the couple. The daily usage limits for ‘Teleport' and 'Cheer' reset every day at 00:00. \n\nIf you click the 'Break up' button, you request a breakup from your partner. If the request is declined or no response is received, you can notify the breakup after a cooldown period. Please be cautious, as when you break up with your partner, the couple ring, anniversary gifts, and all items in the Storage will be deleted, and couple-related functions will be disabled.
Filipino: Inaayos ng window na ito ang inyong couple; makikita dito ang impormasyon ng inyong couple at mga functions na magagamit ng bawat miyembro; ang daily usage limits para sa Teleport at Cheer ay nare-reset araw-araw alas 00:00; kapag pindutin mo ang Break up button magrerequest ka ng breakup sa partner \n\n kung itinanggi ang request o walang sagot puwede mo ulitin ang breakup pagkatapos ng cooldown; mag-ingat dahil kapag nag-break up mawawala ang couple ring; anniversary gifts; at lahat ng items sa Storage at mae-disable ang couple-related functions.

English:
This window provides information about your Life Skill and allows you to use related features.

Click the 'Set as an Expert' button at the bottom to specialize in a specific Life Skill for a designated period. A bonus effect will be applied when you set your area of expertise. 

Note that once your expertise is set, it cannot be changed for some time.
Filipino: Nagbibigay ang window na ito ng impormasyon tungkol sa Life Skill at pinapayagan kang gamitin ang mga kaugnay na feature \n\n pindutin ang Set as an Expert button sa ibaba para mag-specialize sa isang Life Skill sa itinakdang panahon; magkakaroon ng bonus effect kapag nakaset ang expertise; tandaan na kapag na-set ang expertise hindi ito agad mababago sa loob ng ilang panahon.

English:
If you have a fishing rod and bait, you can fish in any waterside of Madrigal.
Before you start fishing, select the bait you want to use from your inventory and register it in the popup, then click the start button to begin fishing.
Once you've cast your line, you'll need to wait for a bite.
When the bite comes, you'll play a minigame to catch the fish. Your chances of catching a fish in the mini-game increase as you guess the direction of the fish's progress.
If you don't play the minigame within the time limit, the minigame is considered unplayed.
At the end of the minigame, you can see if you have or have not caught a fish.
While waiting for a bite, you can skip the minigame by checking Skip minigame, and see how much you've caught so far by tapping the Fishing Status button.
Filipino:
Kung mayroon kang fishing rod at bait pwede kang mangisda sa anumang waterside ng Madrigal 
 bago magsimula piliin ang bait mula sa inventory at i-register ito sa popup 
 pagkatapos pindutin ang start button 
 kapag nahulog ang linya maghihintay ka ng bite 
 kapag dumating ang bite maglalaro ka ng minigame para mahuli ang isda 
 tumataas ang tsansa mong makahuli kapag nahulaan mo ang direksyon ng galaw ng isda 
 kung hindi mo nilaro ang minigame sa loob ng time limit ituturing itong hindi nilaro 
 sa dulo ng minigame makikita mo kung may nahuli ka o wala 
 habang naghihintay ng bite pwede mong i-skip ang minigame sa pamamagitan ng pag-check sa Skip minigame at makita kung ilan na ang nahuli mo sa pamamagitan ng Fishing Status button.

English:
You can train a Raised Pet that you've got in your inventory or in the house inventory. Each caretaker NPC has different feeding schedules and intervals.

Once you've selected the Raised Pet you wish to entrust to the Caretaker, #beither by double-clicking or drag-and-drop#nb, simply press the 'Done' button to initiate the Caretaker's training.

#cffff0000If you decide to change the Raised Pet, the next feeding schedule will be reset.#nc

English:
Select which decoration model you want to use and click place. Then follow the instructions: 

- Left click to place
- Mouse wheel to rotate
- Press mouse wheel and mouse left/right to change size.
Filipino:
Piliin ang decoration model na gagamitin at i-click ang place; sundin ang mga instruksyon 

 - Left click para mag-place 
 - Mouse wheel para i-rotate 
 - Pindutin ang mouse wheel at left o right click para baguhin ang laki.

English:
You can proceed with production through this window. If you select a recipe from the filters, you will see information about that recipe and can only produce items that match the recipe.
If you don't select a recipe, you can try to produce with your own material combinations to discover hidden recipes.
You can earn Master’s Chips for random production and for Great Success.
You'll get better quality items when you make a Great Success
Filipino:
Pwede kang gumawa gamit ang window na ito. kung pipili ka ng recipe mula sa filters makikita mo ang impormasyon tungkol sa recipe at puwede ka lamang gumawa ng items na tumutugma sa recipe 
 kung hindi ka pipili ng recipe puwede mong subukan gumawa gamit ang sarili mong kombinasyon ng materyales para makatuklas ng hidden recipes 
 makakakuha ka ng Master’s Chips sa random production at sa Great Success 
 makakagawa ka ng mas mataas na quality items kapag nag-Great Success.
